title: #212: Forensically Deconstructing Jeffrey Epstein Part 8
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa deep dive Episode #6, the final episode in the Wondery's series "The Mysterious Mr. Epstein". We circle back to the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) and discuss those that were named in the NPA and the document's legal standing. 


We discuss "positive reputation management" strategies and tactics employed by both Epstein and Harvey Weinstein and a certain victim rights advocate who worked for Harvey Weinstein to undermine and discredit the victim's in his case, who has now re-surfaced and is representing a number of the Epstein survivors.

#EpsteinCoverUp

#Enablers

#DoubleStandard

#VictimAdvocacy
